value.title: OpenAI offers $100,000 grants for ideas on AI governance

value.title: Meta fined record $1.3 billion by EU over handling of Facebook user data
value.excerpt: European Union data regulators have hit Meta with a $1.3 billion fine (about €1.2 billion) and ordered the company to cease transferring EU Facebook user data to the US by October. The fine exceeds Amazon's $886 million fine from the EU for data protection violations in 2021.
